Class game

java.lang.Object
game
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.util.EventListener
public class game
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.awt.event.ActionListener
Models a settings menu. A GUI displayed before and after games which lets users choose a difficulty level and see if they won or lost
